transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ha sir, very good morning sir.
Customer: Ha sir Krishna sir, good morning.
Executive: Happy sir.
Customer: Oh good sir, good, good, good. Bangalore lo irukingala?
Executive: Illa sir Chennai sir.
Customer: Ok ya, oh mobile number ok ok number takunu, connect vandu pathingana, connect vandu idhu oru ticket pending irundhuchi.
Customer: Adhanala andha time pannumbodhu indha number la varum. En whatsapp number dhan personal number. Adhula irundhu dhan unni call panna venum inime.
Executive: Appadingala, ok ok ok. Idhu takunu patha Bangalore number mari irukku sir.
Executive: Ok sir ok sir ok. Eppadi irukinge?
Customer: Fine sir fine. Kumar sir irukku en number koduthu ungala contact panna sollirupparu. Nannum enakkum avardhan en number koduthu irukku number. So avarum pesikkalam.
Executive: Ok sir ok. Naa ittu evening share pannu pesanum share share panna share panna pesunga appadinnu solli.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm ok ok ok. Fine sir. Enge unga office irukku?
Executive: Office inga Thavuzh la irukku sir actually.
Customer: Oh ok ok. Green photo irukku.
Customer: Enga office enge irukku theriyuma ungalukku?
Executive: Illa namma idhula dhan sir actually, place vandu pathingana andha, around around place namma Thirumazhisai la Thirupathi pogum illaiya andha road Thiruvallur road irukku.
Customer: Thirumazhisai irukku. Aama sir.
Customer: Road Thiruvallur road irukku. Murukkenjeri dhan sir.
Customer: Murukkenjeri exactly Murukkenjeri dhan inga irukku.
Executive: Ok sir ok ok.
Customer: Ok appo appadi pogumbodhu beer factory ku munnadiye varanum. UB beer factory, UB sir beer factory ku munnadiye vandhurum. Jimko engalukku diagonally opposite Jimko avangaloda irukku actually.
Executive: Ok ok sir Jimko. Map la paathu pesumbodhu map la paathu avartta pesumbodhu.
Customer: Very good sir very good. Andha dhan namma unit oru total la oru 45000 square feet irukradhu moonu shed pannittu irukkom. Oru sheet metal fabrication oru idhu adhukappuram assembling part rendu irukku.
Executive: Super super. Aama adhu adhu.
Customer: Adhu engaloda major idhu. Krishnagiri unit kooda inga Krishnagiri pakkam onnu ready pannittu irukkom.
Executive: Krishnagiri ok andha andha location match cover pandra location ok ok. Adhu enna maina sir? Engalukku maina vandu UL listed panels la nariya exports pandradhukku. US Canada adhukku andha unit ku maina andha andha unit thevaippadum engalukku.
Executive: US la dhan focus pandringa sir?
Customer: US US middle east focus pandra mari.
Executive: Ok sir.
Customer: Appuram Saudi Arabia.
Executive: Saudi ok sir super sir. Aama enna angella ungalukku UL list panels edhirpaa thevaippanga.
Executive: Ok sir ok.
Customer: Aama so ippo ungaloda requirement eppadi how can we support you?
Executive: Ippo enna ippo oru sila service vandu sir ta pesinen sir Kumar sir ta pesumbodhu adhu eppadi improve pannalam indha service la eppadi improvement pannalam innum vera enna services la irukku exports irukku andha mari service la discuss pannalam sir ta ippo.
Customer: Ok ok.
Executive: First rendu vishayam pesinom. Onnu idhula indha current service la eppadi improvement panni unni konjo returns paakalaam adhu onnu pesinom. Innum furthera endha service namma pogalaam unni better improvement irukku exports irukku Pan India la focus pandradhukku eppadi dhan focus pannalam appadinnu solli.
Executive: First vandu pathingana services part la usage usage part la so far we are konjo improvement venum sir. Improvement in sense by lead consumption irukulla.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Adha konjo ippo neenga use pannringa namma employees use pandrangala?
Customer: Edhu?
Executive: India mart.
Customer: India marta main ippo naan mattum dhan ippodhikku use panna poren.
Executive: Ok sir appo enna pannalamna daily basis la minimum neenga oru five to ten minutes spend pannale podhum weekend able to function by list throughout the country.
Customer: Correct in fact ippo neenga full and fulla adhula dhan ukkandhu irundhen naanu. Ukkandhu irundhappa vandu rendu enquiry pannen onnu Bangalore idhellam pannen. But quantity vandu onnu single piece dhan single piece support pandradhula konjo kashtamnu paakaren.
Executive: Ok.
Customer: Adhu konjo bulka irundha nalla irukkum.
Executive: MOQ evlo sir namma expect pandrom?
Customer: See adhu la vandu oru at least oru minimum anju quantity at least irundha dhan panna mudiyadhu outstation pandradhukku local na kooda paravalla.
Executive: Minimum five sir.
Customer: Minimum five.
Executive: Ok single pieces na endha locations namma panna Chennai Chennai indha poru district Chennai.
Customer: Chennai Chennai pannalaam. Adhu oru see oru periya panella irundhadhuna single single location la kooda single piece na kooda koduthurlaam. Idhu sadharana enclosure box endradhumbodhu single piece konjo cost ellam pannumbodhu konjo feasible irukkumanu theriyadhu theriyadhu adhukku dhan idhu dhan solren.
Executive: Purinjidhu sir ok got it. Ippo adhaavadhu adhaavadhu oru full fully assembled panel na oru piece na periya vishayamnge. System box indha mari irukkumbodhu oru multiple quantity five six irundha it will be better.
Executive: Ok ok.
Customer: Enna adoda idhu ellam pannumbodhu pathana bulk enna adhu nariya vishayathula vandu we can save on cost.
Executive: Hmm got it sir got it got your point actually. Naa whatsapp la oru screenshot anuppuren. First rendu vishayam idhula eppadi ellam improvement pannalamnu onnu innondhu endha services pogalaam rendu vishayam andha pesinom. Kumar sir convey panna sonnaru actually. Ippo first point indha service la unni konjo improvement eppadi pannano eppadi pannalam appadinnu pathingana ungaloda whatsapp la screenshot anuppi irukken paaren.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm hmm ok oru nimisham. Indha product indha product paaren paaren.
Customer: Irukku oru nimisham whatsapp la whatsapp la anuppi irukingala?
Executive: Anuppi irukken sir.
Customer: Ok aama.
Customer: Aama irukku correct. Oh vandhuruchu paathen naanu.
Executive: Idhellame namma pannittu irukkom sir correct thangala?
Customer: Aama.
Executive: Idhu onna core products correct thangala?
Customer: Aama.
Executive: Idhellame dhan sir edhu sir 2 4 6 8 10 12 almost 12 numbers me.
Customer: 12 numbers na ellame engaloda core product dhan onnu prachana kidaiyadhu. Onnu pannunga namma idhellame focused idhellame focused product dhan actually. Nariya irundhadhu ellame cut panni eduthachu naanga.
Executive: Ok.
Customer: Ok indha APFC panel eduthurlaamnu thonudhu enakku adhu vendaamnu thonudhu enakku.
Executive: Onnum illa sir namma India mart login open pannunga systema.
Customer: Ore nimisham adhula dhan irukken.
Customer: Ha sollunga.
Executive: Product irukku sir.
Customer: Aama.
Executive: Andha product click pannunga.
Customer: Ok.
Executive: Products poittu ippo 15 15 products irukku activa 15 products irukku.
Executive: 15 active products irukkingala mela recommended products to sell nu irukulla.
Customer: Mela vandu?
Executive: Recommended products to sell nu irukku irukkingala? Recommended products irunga ippo vandu enakku vandu products la click panna udane mela top la active 15 add product quick add irukku more option irukku avlodhan.
Executive: Adhukku mela adhukkum mela recommended products to sell nu irukka?
Customer: Illaiya adhukappuram heading dhan varudhu header dhan varudhu lead manager vandhu dhan varudhu.
Executive: Page refresh pannunga sir full page.
Customer: Irunga.
Customer: Varalaiye varalaiye.
Executive: Neenga google meet la irundha google meet la share pannattuma?
Executive: Fine sir naa ippo meeting schedule pannaren. Aama meeting schedule pannunga adha kaattaren naa paakalaam. Ok ok sir vaanga ore share pannunga ok.
Customer: Vanakkam sir good evening.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to improve current services.

- Wants to know other services for better improvement.

- Wants to improve buylead consumption.

- Single piece support is difficult.



Resolution:

- Executive asked about current usage of IndiaMART.

- Executive suggested spending 5-10 minutes daily.

- Executive shared a screenshot on WhatsApp.

- Executive offered to schedule a Google Meet.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will schedule a Google Meet.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, buyleads, services, products
